<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/fp-connector/api/v1/register-new-rsapin"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint is used to register new RSAPIN for new users.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"dateofbirth":{"description":"The date of birth of the user in the format MM/DD/YYYY","type":"string","format":"date","example":"01/01/1970"},"employerCode":{"description":"The code of the employer","type":"string","example":"E-20239"},"employerName":{"description":"the name of the employer","type":"string","example":"Mike Kaks"},"fundCode":{"description":"The fund code associated with the user's account","type":"string","example":"20233"},"firstName":{"description":"The first name of the employee","type":"string","example":" Mike"},"lastName":{"description":"the last name of employee","type":"string","example":" Kaks"},"middlename":{"description":"the middle name of employee","type":"string","example":" Nino"},"mobilePhone":{"description":"the phone number of employee","type":"string","example":7082031234},"nIN":{"description":"the national identity number of the employee","type":"string","example":"59403849302"},"pfacode":{"description":"the he PFA code associated with the employee","type":"string","example":"10024"},"rsaPin":{"description":"The employee's RSAPIN to be registered","type":"string","example":"2026r"}}},"examples":{"Register New RSAPIN":{"value":{"dateofbirth":"01/01/1970","employerCode":"E-20239","employerName":"Mike Kaks","firstName":" Mike","fundCode":"20233","lastName":" Kaks","middlename":" Nino","mobilePhone":"07082031234","nIN":"59403849302","pfacode":"10024","rsaPin":"2026r"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Response","headers":{"Content-Encoding":{"schema":{"type":"string","example":"gzip"}},"Date":{"schema":{"type":"string","example":"Wed, 28 Feb 2024 09:47:30 GMT"}},"Server":{"schema":{"type":"string","example":"Microsoft-IIS/10.0"}},"Transfer-Encoding":{"schema":{"type":"string","example":"chunked"}},"Vary":{"schema":{"type":"string","example":"Accept-Encoding"}},"X-Powered-By":{"schema":{"type":"string","example":"ASP.NET"}}},"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"data":{"nullable":true,"example":null},"message":{"type":"string","example":"Registration Successful, RSA PIN with Employee name 2026r  Mike  Nino  Kaks"},"success":{"type":"boolean","example":true}}},"examples":{"Response":{"value":{"data":null,"message":"Registration Successful, RSA PIN with Employee name 2026r  Mike  Nino  Kaks","success":true}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
